Title: 39545 - # Ways You Can Use Your Christmas Lights All Year Long
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 different ways that people can use their Christmas lights all year long. You can discuss craft and DIY projects, or décor for inside and outside of the home. Your target audience is those who are interested in crafts and DIY projects. The target URL can easily be placed in any section where the use of Christmas lights is mentioned.
